_header: As I sat upon a straw
Note:
Formerly 102.3; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 196.
_description: A carol lacking first and sixth stanzas — six quatrains (abab) and 2-line burden (bb): ‘Newes newes newes newes / Ye never herd so many newes’

BLCottVesAXXV.First Lines: A [ ] upon a straweCudlyng of my cowe…
BLCottVesAXXV.Last Lines: …Our cate lyet syke and takyte gret sorowe…
BLCottVesAXXV.Note: MS damaged; beginning illegible and ends incomplete.
